resources.string: Coaching at Your Fingertips\n“Coach the team regularly, for best performance”
**The following questions is a guidelines for you to coach the team to develop better
**The following questions is a guidelines for you to coach the team to develop better in Selling Skills (Basic Call Procedure)
PADA SAAT KUNJUNGAN\nPembukaan, Store Check, Presentasi, Penutup, Merchandising\n(Tandai Jika Mengetahui)
DURING VISIT\nOpening, Store Check, Presentation, Closing, Merchandising
2. Men-cek stock availability yang ada di gudang
3. Mengetahui dan memahami promo-promo yang sedang berlangsung
\t a. TRC/LE Mobility, Alat Tulis, dan Kalkulator
3. Know and understand the ongoing promo
\t a. TRC/LE Mobility, Stationery, and Calculator
2. Check stock produk UFS baik yang sudah didisplay di shelf maupun di gudang
\t a. Menawarkan penambahan stock (taking order) pada customer
\t c. Presentasi produk: menguasai keunggulan produk
\t d. Presentasi harga : menguasai harga produk yang ditawarkan
\t e. Presentasi program: menguasai program-program yang sedang berlangsung
4. Penutupan: merekonfirmasi hasil kunjugan (jumlah orderan, dll)
2. Stock check for UFS product, either on shelf or warehouse
\t a. Offers stock addition (taking order) to customer
\t c. Product Presentation : mastery of product advantages
\t d. Price Presentation : mastery of product price
\t e. Program presentation : mastery of ongoing programs
4. Closing: reconfirms visit result (total order, etc)
1. Melakukan sync LE Mobility atau menginformasikan semua order ke Admin DMS
2. Merangkum hasil penjualan hari itu dan mencatatkan di Wall Report/Laporan Dinding
1. Synchronizing LE Mobility or inform every order to Admin DMS
2.  Summarize total sales on that day & Write it down in Wall Report
Tuliskan apa yang telah dilakukan dengan baik (max. 3hal)
Tuliskan apa yang dapat dilakukan dengan lebih baik (max.3hal)
Tuliskan apa yang perlu dilakukan untuk mendukung point 2 di atas (max.3action)
Write what has been done well? (max. 3pages)
Write what needs to be done to support the 2 points above (max. 3action)
\t\tb. Apakah semua Front Pack menghadap kedepan?
\t\ta. Materi POS apa yang tersedia saat ini dari marketing?
\t\tb. Bila ada POS material dari Trade Marketing, apakah sudah di implementasi?
\t\ta. Apakah FA/SA/Merchandiser telah menjelaskan produk sesuai dengan Selling Story ke customer?\n(bila tidak ada customer, tanyakan langsung keunggulan produk tersebut)
\t\ta. Apakah Price Tag produk telah terpampang di Shelf (ter-listing)
\t\ta. Apakah Price Tag produk telah terpampang di Shelf (ter-listing)
\t\ta. Berapakah produk tersebut dijual di Store? (A)
\t\tc. Berapakah harga kompetitor produk sejenis di Store tersebut? (C)
\t\td. Berapakah ukuran produk kompetitor tersebut? (gram atau ml) (D)
\t\ta. Berapa jumlah tier yang digunakan untuk men-display produk UFS di Shelf?
\t\tb. Berapa jumlah tier yang digunakan competitor sejenis untuk men-display produknya di Shelf
\t\tc. Apakah SOS (jumlah tier) produk UFS lebih dari produk competitor?
\t\ta. Does all product available on Shelf?
\t\tb. Does all Front Pack face forward?
\t\ta. What POS material is available from marketing?
\t\tb. If there are POS material from Trade Marketing, is it implemented?
\t\ta. Has the FA/SA/Merchandiser explained about product according to Selling Story to the customer?\n(if there is no customer, ask the advantage of the product)
\t\ta. Is the product Price Tag showed on Shelf (listed)
\t\ta. Is the product Price Tag showed on Shelf (listed)
\t\ta. How much is the product price at the Store? (A)
\t\tb. What is the product size? (gram or ml) (B)
\t\tc. How much is the similar product price at the store? (C)
\t\td. What is the size of the similar product? (gram or ml) (D)
\t\ta. How many tier is used to display UFS product at Shelf?
\t\tb. How many tier is used by similar competitor to display their product at Shelf
\t\tc. Is the SOS (tier count) for UFS product more than competitor product?
**The following questions is a guidelines for you to coach the team to develop better in territory management, distributor management, and chefmanship
a. Berapa banyak wholesaler yang dicover oleh distributor?
b. Berapa banyak wholesaler bakery yang dicover?
c. Berapa banyak wholesaler Horeca yang dicover?
d. Berapa banyak pasar yang terdapat di territory Anda? Berapa banyak yang sudah dicover?
e. Berapa banyak Local Cash & Carry (LCC) yang terdapat di territory Anda? Berapa banyak yang sudah dicover?
a. Berapa target full year Anda?
b. Berapa RPP (rata-rata penjualan per pekan) distributor Anda?
c. Berapa persen pencapaiannya di minggu lalu?
1. Apakah Anda tahu Top 10 UFS? Apa saja?
2. Apakah Anda tahu target & achievement penetrasi dari produk TLC berikut :
a. Royco Bumbu Dasar Ayam Kuning
1. Seberapa sering anda mengikuti training Simple Wet Sampling Dilution In-Class Training yang dilakukan oleh ASM Pull?
2. Berapa SKU yang anda hafal Selling Story / Kelebihannya ? Sebutkan
a. Seberapa sering Anda melakukan morning dan afternoon briefing?
b. Apakah Anda dapat menjelaskan point apa saja yang terdapat dalam wall report?\n*Minta DTS untuk menunjukan dan menjelaskan Wall Report yang ada di distributor
a. Berapa persen pencapaian kunjungan DSR yang sesuai dengan PJP?
b. Berapa persen rata-rata effective call (EC) masing-masing DSR Anda?\n*Minta DTS untuk menunjukan dan menjelaskan konten yang ada pada TRC atau Leveredge Mobility
a.Seberapa sering Anda melakukan coaching untuk DSR?
b. Seberapa sering Anda melakukan coaching untuk DSS?
c. Apakah Anda menggunakan aplikasi ini untuk mendokumentasikan hasil coaching tersebut?\n*DTS sebaiknya melakukan coaching kepada DSR 2x/minggu dan kepada DSS/OM 1x/minggu
1. Seberapa baik Anda mengetahui kondisi dan rencana perbaikan (bila ada) dari :
a. Kondisi gudang (Racking, dinding, lantai, ceiling/plafon, dan ventilasi)
b. Perlakukan untuk produk rusak (adanya label dan pemisahan di tempat khusus)
e. Penataan produk dalam gudang (foods dan non-foods tidak tercampur)
f. Stacking produk sesuai dengan yang direkomendasikan di karton
g. Jadwal pembersihan dan perawatan gudang
a. Apakah kondisi kendaraan bebas dari rembesan oli, ban botak?
b. Apakah body, Atap, pintu & Lantai kendaaran bebas dari kerusakan & berfungsi baik?
c. Apakah bagian dalam kendaraan bebas dari basah dan lembab?
d. Apakah lantai kendaraan bebas dari serpihan kasar, kaca, paku, staples?
e. Apakah kendaraan dalam kondisi bebas bekas terserang hama (misal: rayap, sarang serangga /laba laba)?
3. Apakah Anda sebagai bisnis partner pernah mendiskusikan perbaikan ini dengan owner distributor?
a. Apakah DSR melakukan kunjungan sesuai PJP dan mengisi TRC/LeverEdge Mobility?
b. Saat DSR menawarkan produk, apakah Product Knowledge sesuai Selling Story?
c. Seberapa dekat relasi Anda dengan Top 10 wholesaler Anda?
a. How many wholesaler is covered by distributor?
b. How many bakery wholesaler is covered?
c. How many Horeca wholesaLer is covered?
d. How many market available on your territory ? How many has been covered?
e. How many Local Cash & Carry (LCC) available in your territory? How many has been covered?
a. What is your full-year target?
b. What is your distributor RRP (Average Weekly Sales)?
c. What is the achievement percentage last week?
1. Do you know Top 10 UFS? What are they?
2. Do you know the penetration target & achievement of these TLC products :
a. Royco Bumbu Dasar Ayam Kuning
1. How often do you join Simple Wet Sampling Dilution In-Class Training held by ASM Pull?
2. How much SKU point that you memorize (please mention the strength/Selling Story)
a. How often your team do morning and afternoon briefing at the distributor?
b. Does your DTS team well-informed about the points on the wall report?\n*Ask the ASM/DTS to show and explain the Wall Report at the distributor
a. What is the percentage of average achievement of DSR visitation according to PJP in your territory?
b. What is the percentage of average effective call (EC) on each DSR in your territory?\n*Ask DTS to show and explain the contents of TRC or Leveredge Mobility
a. How often do you conduct coaching for DSR?
b. How often do you conduct coaching for DSS?
c. Should you use this application to document the coaching result?\n*DTS should conduct coaching to DSR 2x/week and to DSS/OM 1x/week
1. How well do you know the condition and repair plans (if any) of :
a. Warehouse condition (Racking, wall, floor, ceiling, and ventilation)
b. Treatment to broken products (labeling and separation to another place)
e. Warehouse product placement (separate foods and non-foods)
f. Product stacking according to recommended stacking instruction in package
g. Warehouse Cleaning and Maintenance Schedule
a. Is the vehicle free from spilled oil and bald tires?
b. Is the vehicle body, ceiling, door & floor free from damage and works well?
c. Is the vehicle interior wet & humid free?
d. Is the vehicle floor free from splinters, flakes, glasses, nails, or stables?
e. Is the vehicle free from any pests (e.g.: termite, bug, spider - and its webs)?
3. Does you, as the business partner, ever discussed this repair with the distributor owner?
a. Does the DSR conduct visits according to PJP and fills the TRC/LeverEdge Mobility?
b. When DSR offers product, is the Product Knowledge corresponds the Selling Story?
c. How close is your relation to your Top 10 wholesaler ?
DISTRIBUTOR PROFILE\n (seperti yang tertera dalam JBP)
a. Berapa banyak wholesaler yang dicover oleh distributor?
b. Berapa banyak wholesaler bakery yang dicover?
c. Berapa banyak wholesaLer Horeca yang dicover?
d. Berapa banyak pasar yang terdapat di territory Anda? Berapa banyak yang sudah dicover?
e. Berapa banyak Local Cash & Carry (LCC) yang terdapat di territory Anda? Berapa banyak yang sudah dicover?
a. Berapa target full year Anda?
b. Berapa RPP (rata-rata penjualan per pekan) distributor Anda?
c. Berapa persen pencapaiannya di minggu lalu?
a. Berapa persen kontribusi bisnis UFS dibandingkan total bisnis distributor?
b. Pada urutan keberapa UFS dibandingkan dengan principle lain?
a. Apa saja perbaikan yang disetujui dengan distributor yang terdapat pada JBP tahun ini?
b. Apa saja kesulitan yang dihadapi pada saat melakukan JBP?
a. Apakah Anda telah menghitung Distributor Profitability kuartal lalu? Ada kesulitan?
b. Bagaimana hasil Return of Investmentnya (ROI) & apa maksudnya?
c. Bagaimana hasil Net Profit Before Tax (NPBT) & apa maksudnya?
d. Bagaimana hasil Return of Working Capital (ROWC) & apa maksudnya?
e. Apa rencana Anda setelah melihat hasilnya?
a. Berapa rencana penambahan wholesaler/Stock Point di area Anda dan bagiamana realisasinya?
b. Berapa rencana peningkatan fokus program di tahun ini dan bagaimana realisasinya?
1. Apakah Anda tahu Top 10 UFS? Apa saja?
2. Apakah Anda tahu target & achievement penetrasi dari produk TLC berikut :
a. Royco Bumbu Dasar Ayam Kuning
1. Seberapa sering tim Anda melakukan refreshmen Product Knowledge and Selling Skills Training untuk tim di Distributor Anda (Leader as Teacher)
a. Seberapa sering tim Anda melakukan morning dan afternoon briefing di distributor?
b. Apakah tim DTS Anda mengetahui dengan jelas point yang ada dalam wall report?\n*Minta ASM/DTS untuk menunjukan dan menjelaskan Wall Report yang ada di distributor
a. Berapa persen rata-rata pencapaian kunjungan DSR yang sesuai dengan PJP di area Anda?
b. Berapa persen rata-rata effective call (EC) masing-masing DSR di area Anda?\n*Minta ASM/DTS untuk menunjukan dan menjelaskan Wall Report yang ada di distributor juga menjelaskan pencapaiannya
a. Seberapa sering Anda melakukan coaching untuk DTS?
b. Seberapa sering Anda melakukan coaching untuk DSS/OM?
c. Seberapa sering tim DTS melakukan coaching ke DSR?
d. Apakah Anda dan tim DTS Anda menggunakan aplikasi ini untuk mendokumentasikan hasil coaching tersebut?\n*ASM sebaiknya melakukan coaching kepada DTS 3x/minggu
1. Seberapa baik Anda mengetahui kondisi dan rencana perbaikan (bila ada) dari :
a. Kondisi gudang (Racking, dinding, lantai, ceiling/plafon, dan ventilasi)
b. Perlakukan untuk produk rusak (adanya label dan pemisahan di tempat khusus)
e. Penataan produk dalam gudang (foods dan non-foods tidak tercampur)
f. Stacking produk sesuai dengan yang direkomendasikan di karton
g. Jadwal pembersihan dan perawatan gudang
a. Apakah kondisi kendaraan bebas dari rembesan oli, ban botak?
b. Apakah body, Atap, pintu & Lantai kendaaran bebas dari kerusakan & berfungsi baik?
c. Apakah bagian dalam kendaraan bebas dari basah dan lembab?
d. Apakah lantai Kendaraan bebas dari serpihan kasar, kaca, paku, staples?
e. Apakah kendaraan dalam kondisi bebas bekas terserang hama (misal: rayap, sarang serangga /laba laba)?
3. Apakah Anda sebagai bisnis partner pernah mendiskusikan perbaikan ini dengan owner distributor?
a. Apakah DSR melakukan kunjungan sesuai PJP dan mengisi TRC/LeverEdge Mobility?
b. Saat DSR menwarkan produk, apakah Product Knowledge sesuai Selling Story?
c. Apakah Anda tahu aktifitas kompetitor dari produk Top 10?
d. Apakah Anda tahu aktifitas kompetitor dari produk TLC?
e. Apa rencana Anda untuk meningkatkan penetrasi Top 10 dan penetrasi TLC?
a. How many wholesaler is covered by distributor?
b. How many bakery wholesaler is covered?
c. How many Horeca wholesaLer is covered?
d. How many market available on your territory ? How many has been covered?
e. How many Local Cash & Carry (LCC) available in your territory? How many has been covered?
a. What is your full-year target?
b. What is your distributor AWS (Average Weekly Sales)?
c. What is the achievement percentage last week?
a. What is the percentage of UFS business contribution compared to total distributor business?
b. What is the UFS rank compared to other principles?
a. What are the improvements approved with distributor on this year\'s JBP?
b. What are the difficulties when doing JBP?
a. Have you calculated the Distributor Profitability last quarter? Any difficulties?
b. How is the Return of Investmentnya (ROI) & what does it means?
c. How is the Net Profit Before Tax (NPBT) & what does it means?
d. How is the Return of Working Capital (ROWC) & what does it means?
e. What is your plan after seeing the results?
a. How many additional wholesaler/Stock Point planned in your di area and how do you realize it?
b. How many additional program focus in this year and how do you realize it?
1. Do you know Top 10 UFS? What are they?
2. Do you know the penetration target & achievement of these TLC products :
a. Royco Bumbu Dasar Ayam Kuning
1. How often do you conduct refreshment of Product Knowledge and Selling Skills Training for your team in assigned distributor (Leader as Teacher)?
a. How often your team do morning and afternoon briefing at the distributor?
b. Does your DTS team well-informed about the points on the wall report?\n*Ask the ASM/DTS to show and explain the Wall Report at the distributor
a. What is the percentage of average achievement of DSR visitation according to PJP in your territory?
b. What is the percentage of average effective call (EC) on each DSR in your territory?\n*Ask the ASM/DTS to show and explain the Wall Report at the distributor and its achievement
a. How often do you conduct coaching for DTS?
b. How often do you conduct coaching for DSS/OM?
c. How often the DTS team conducts coaching to DSR?
d. Do you and your DTS team use this application to document the coaching result?\n*ASM should conduct coaching to DTS for 3x/week
1. How well do you know the condition and repair plans (if any) of :
a. Warehouse condition (Racking, wall, floor, ceiling, and ventilation)
b. Treatment to broken products (labeling and separation to another place)
e. Warehouse product placement (separate foods and non-foods)
f. Product stacking according to recommended stacking instruction in package
g. Warehouse Cleaning and Maintenance Schedule
a. Is the vehicle free from spilled oil and bald tires?
b. Is the vehicle body, ceiling, door & floor free from damage and works well?
c. Is the vehicle interior wet & humid free?
d. Is the vehicle floor free from splinters, flakes, glasses, nails, or stables?
e. Is the vehicle free from any pests (e.g.: termite, bug, spider - and its webs)?
3. Does you, as the business partner, ever discussed this repair with the distributor owner?
a. Does the DSR conduct visits according to PJP and fills the TRC/LeverEdge Mobility?
b. When DSR offers product, is the Product Knowledge corresponds the Selling Story?
c. Do you know the competitor activity of Top 10 products?
d. Do you know the competitor activity of TLC products?
e. What is your plan to improve the penetration of Top 10 and TLC?
**The following questions is a guidelines for you to coach the team to develop better in Amstrong usage and Habbit

**The following questions is a guidelines for you to coach the team to develop better in Amstrong usage and Call Procedure

A. Kelengkapan customer profile\n(5 informasi utama untuk digital : contact person name, Customer/business name, postal code address, contact person telp/email, type of business/Channel)\n(dan tanyakan tipe OTM setiap customer)
*How: Home>customers> click on Customer name> search the info under \"Basic\" & \"Contact\"
1. Minta SR untuk menunjukan data customer yang telah memiliki 5 informasi utama untuk digital
2. Berapa customer yang belum lengkap dan mengapa?
B. Minta SR untuk menjelaskan mengenai pencapaian sejak menggunakan Armstrong
3. Average Calls per actual working day
1. Seberapa sering anda melakukan Wet Sampling di Operator ?
2. Apa kesulitan yang anda hadapi saat melakukan Wet Sampling ?
A. Minta SR untuk menjelaskan apa yang telah dipersiapkan di Armstrong
a. Apakah objective pada hari tersebut adalah menawarkan NPI?
b. Apakah SR telah menyiapkan wet sampling tools yang berkaitan dengan NPI diatas?
B. Ikuti aktifitas SR dan memastikan SR menggunakan Armstrong secara maksimal (min. SR menggunakan Armstrong pada 4 aktifitas dibawah ini)
b. Presentasi ke decision maker menggunakan Media Demo di Armstrong
c. Melakukan Wet Sampling / cooking demo dan me-record di Armstrong
d. Mencatat TFO (Transfer Form Order) di Armstrong

A. Completeness of Customer Profile\n(5 primary information for digital: contact person name, Customer/business name, postal code address, contact person telp/email, type of business/Channel)\n(and ask the OTM type to each customer)
*How: Home>Customers>Click on Customer name> Search the info under \"Basic\" & \"Contact\"
1. Ask the SR to show the customer data with 5 primary information for digital
2. How many customers were not complete and why?
B. Ask SR to explain their achievement since using Armstrong
b. What are the plans to improve?
b. What are the plans to improve?
3. Average Calls per actual working day
b. What are the plans to improve?

1. How often do you conduct Wet Sampling in Operator ?
2. What is the difficulty in conducting Wet Sampling ?
A. Ask the SR to explain what preparation has been done in Armstrong
a. Does the objective of the day is to offer NPI?
b. Does the SR prepared the wet sampling tools according to the NPI in the question a?
B. Follow the SR activity and ensure the SR uses Armstrong to its maximum extent (SR at least uses Armstrong on these 4 activities below )
b. Presentation to decision maker using Media Demo in Armstrong
c. Doing Wet Sampling / cooking demo and record it using Armstrong
d. Record the TFO (Transfer Form Order) using Armstrong
